title: Apartment for rent
description: We are looking for someone to take over our 1br apartment in the friendly "Liberties West" gated community. It's on a the first floor of a cute real brick house and has a hallway/ entrance area inside. Beautiful hardwood floors, marble top kitchen and bathroom with bathtub and shower, all in good condition. The spacious living room has a ceiling fan and offers plenty of light especially in the morning. Bedroom's windows are facing the calm backyard/garden. There are 5 closets in the apartment with good storage room. Laundry on site. The condominium is Located at 7th and Fairmount Ave in Northern Liberties, in between Fairmount, Fishtown and close to many nice coffee places, restaurants, bars and beautiful parks and playgrounds. Aldi, Target, Giant and other stores are in even walkable distance. Federal Donuts and a mini market is right across the street :) There is a huge green backyard with picknick tables to hang out, trees, BBQ areas and safe parking lots for bicycles and cars. The old, real brick buildings are well kept, so the garden is. This is a really nice and pet friendly place with lovely neighbors that offers a lot of calmness and convenience.
